website_summaries.verdict: With a 24"x24" chrome cooking grid, it can be used for both heat generation and grilling. We especially like its large capacity and overall appearance.
pros: Exceptionally deep fire box can handle larger hardwood fires
Strong mesh prevents sparks from escaping
cons: Thinner-gauge steel rusts and warps easily
Protective cover must be purchased separately
Some owners tell us the fire pit is more ornamental than functional

customer_reviews.title: A Real Fire Pit for a Real Fire
customer_reviews.text: I love this fire pit. After searching for the perfect fire pit that would fit an adequate amount of wood, I believe this is the one. Many other fire pits hold very little wood or can only handle kindling; however, this one will fit several substantial pieces no problem and can handle a decent size fire for groups to sit around. The design makes it easy to get oxygen to the fire and start it from scratch. It also comes with a grilling rack should you want to cook out over the fire. It looks great and is sturdy. I would be sure to get a cover for it as, with any outdoor items, can start to rust with exposure.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie B

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It's too early to say if it will last me 5 years as my last one did. So, if it does, awesome! It looks good in my yard and you can see much more of the fire because of its design. The quality is what you would expect from a firepit that costs $90.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Paint Flaked Off During First Use
customer_reviews.text: This firepit started to rust after just 1 use. The paint flaked off during the only use on July 3. I wonder if I can just spray paint over it. UPDATE The floor eventually rusted out. Re replaced it with the heavier Amazon Basics version amd a cover.
customer_reviews.author: Paddy MeBoy

customer_reviews.title: Damaged item
customer_reviews.text: Our item was damaged upon receipt. Two sides and across the bottom were damaged, resulting in fire pit not being square and making it difficult to put together. We needed to use longer screws that did not come with the fire pit in order to put it together. This is quite disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Riley

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded our expectations
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this fire pit. It is beautiful with it without a fire. It is very deep and handled a large amount of wood easily. The grate made roasting hot dogs very easy too.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Twins

customer_reviews.title: Top Mis-Shaped
customer_reviews.text: For me it's just "ok" because of the cover. Other than that the fire pit itself worked out. As you can see in the pic it is mis-shaped which makes it harder to place back on with the fire going. Didn't want to go through the hassle of returning it. You could clearly see the cover wasn't right as soon as I took it out of the box. Can never understand how a company doesn't notice their product prior to shipping.
customer_reviews.author: MissBetsyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but then rusted immediately
customer_reviews.text: I liked it fine. It's not pretty—just a box with screen walls, really. But it was just right for my patio. I used it once and left it on the patio. Within a couple of days it started rusting. I guess you really MUST get the cover, which makes me think the cover should automatically be sold with the fire pit. Anyway, I'm disappointed. Anyone know if you can use a rust protection spray on something you intend to put fire in?
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Maness

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking - Probably Not Long-Lasting
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice fire pit for the price. It's pretty lightweight/cheap metal, so I'm not sure how long it will last. The square shape and open sides design are really pretty compared to the standard circular fire pits. It's also a good size. Could probably fit 4-6 adults around it comfortably. It did have a bad chemical smell the first time we used it. Pretty sure the paint was burning off.
customer_reviews.author: MTshopper

customer_reviews.title: Rusting piece of garbage
customer_reviews.text: Used it once and it started rusting next day. Been sitting in my shed for weeks since I can’t return until Kohl’s reopens, it’s now completely rusted all over. So sad because I liked the design and was excited about it but I’d be better off using one of my old wheel barrows instead. Will purchase a much better one at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Deez Amazonz

customer_reviews.title: Oh the joy of spending a summer evening sitting around the fire ...
customer_reviews.text: Oh the joy of spending a summer evening sitting around the fire with a few beers and friends. We looked and looked to find the right fire pit. We wanted one that wasn't to small and was open on the bottom to allow for the heat to be enjoyed on our feet. This one is perfect for everything we wanted it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Larson

customer_reviews.title: I purchased longer ones with the same thread (so I could use the supplied nuts) and it assembled fine. B) The Veranda 71942 Squa
customer_reviews.text: Con: A) As advised by other user's comments, the bolts that are provided do not match up very will (too short). I purchased longer ones with the same thread (so I could use the supplied nuts) and it assembled fine. B) The Veranda 71942 Square cover that is suggested is not a good fitting cover for this unit. I purchased a tarp at a local store and adapted it to fit. Pro: The unit is very attractive and burns well. Light and easy to move in and out of storage.The grill that was provided worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk!
customer_reviews.text: This product has basically went to crap even though its been stored in my garage its whole live it will need a repaint as for the poker rod that broke within the first day!
customer_reviews.author: Reece M

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Cheap piece of crud. It came to us dented up in the package. Had one fire in it on our deck (something we have done dozens of times with our old fire pit) and it lit the deck on fire! I've read other reviews that said it lit the grass underneath of it on fire. I wouldn't even trust it on brick or stone unless it was heat resistant. Returning and will be seeking money from the company to replace the damaged section of my deck.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Durable, projects heat, great design!
customer_reviews.text: Great fireplace and it actually heats up your legs because of the holes. Most fire places have you huddling around it because the heat only comes upwards. You can sit and feel the heat all around. Also the design is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying my fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a few weeks and so far so good. Great size, followed suggestions to spray with Rust-Oleum before use and it's worked out great. Also purchased the cover to keep it out of the rain. Looking forward to warmer weather where I can use it again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Quintana

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and build of this fire pit. It is easy to assemble, easy to clean too. The only bad thing is the top section got damaged during shipping. It works great and burned my firewood completely even after it got rained on.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Fire pit
customer_reviews.text: I finally got my replacement firepit after my 1st order got lost during shipping. Free of charge n worth the wait. My only wish was it were heavier metal, my fear is fire getting hot enough to burn threw after a few fires. For Now...its chocolate/ marshmallow samore time.
customer_reviews.author: Connie L Brown

customer_reviews.title: Cute and huge in my tiny yard! Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a firepit that could actually hold a decent sized fire, but also didn't break the bank. This exceeded my expectations. It's huge and cute. You could make a small bonfire! I followed another reviewer's advice and got the classic accessories veranda square patio ottoman cover. It fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: E. Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome look
customer_reviews.text: This rustic looking fire pit will be used for our "tribal council" fire when our family plays SURVIVOR for the holidays this year! Can't wait! After the game, it will become a gift to one of the players!
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for backyard fun
customer_reviews.text: Love this fire pit, perfect height and width. I want to use it every night, but sometimes the weather get in the way of that. Just for a heads up, make sure to purchase a firepit cover. Mine started to have rust at the top from a few days of heavy rain.
customer_reviews.author: Cora Dijala

customer_reviews.title: Careful with placement.
customer_reviews.text: Product burned all the grass under it. Do not use in ur lawn unless u dont care it will be ruined or you have something under it to prevent it from destroying your lawn.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but small defect..
customer_reviews.text: Nice look, but either mine got damaged during shipping, or it's already falling apart. Arrived with weird hole on one of the corners. Have not lit the pit up yet.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but deformed from fire
customer_reviews.text: I recently ordered this product and have now made two fires in it. It’s a nice looking fire pit and when it gets cooking it looks really good. The only problem I have had is that it deformed from the fire on one side. (I’ll attach a picture if I can figure it out). It still looks good and I’ll keep burning away it’s just slightly disappointing that after just two fires the metal became deformed.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Kuehn

customer_reviews.title: Cozy but not the best screws
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like how most of the screws didn’t go all the way in. It seemed improperly drilled. But I do like the vents at the bottom which allow heat to reach your feet. Cozy!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Loots

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this! Set up and used one tome. Next morning...photos, if allowed, speak for themselves!!! Completely rusted and not just topcoat! Many spots rusted through paint to metal!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lil~Bit

customer_reviews.title: Yes this is a BARGAIN!
customer_reviews.text: Yes this is a bargain. Great quality, size and it has a cooking grate. Less than 5 minutes to assemble. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kathy80138

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this item, I had no idea what all I was going to do with it. I just knew I wanted a nice firepit. I own a small cooking business, so I've been trying all kinds of stuff of it. Ribs, seafood, and did a whole fish fire on it. Hopefully this will help others get a bette/clear visual and just go from there. But I love it. Does exactly what it should. You can use wood or coal.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, we didn’t get to enjoy it.
customer_reviews.text: What would have been a great addition to our summer nights, but it showed up like a mangled piece of shrapnel. So, there’s that. Wish we had something else to go on for experience, but we don’t. Good thing our neighbors have a fire pit. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for smaller spaces...Looks more expensive than it is.  No assembly required too!
customer_reviews.text: Sister loved it. Not an outdoor gal but wanted that accent in her tiny yard. Looks and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏿👍🏿👍🏿👍🏿👍🏿
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. We love it! Haven’t used it quite yet. Will update. Bit looks beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Work cut out for you
customer_reviews.text: Super hard to assemble. Looks ok once we got the holes to line up but you can tell we had to bend parts to make it fit.
customer_reviews.author: tara richardson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but rusty
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice. But the top rusted the very first time we used it which it also rained that night. The entire top is rusted. I’ve had it about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Verduci

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: First night trying it out and it’s wonderful, big enough for a big fire or little fire
customer_reviews.author: Candice0521

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great.
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality for the money (definitely get the cover). I do not love the mesh sides; it allows for ash and coal to blow away and limits the days we are able to use it based on the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Lapointe

customer_reviews.title: it is pretty though.
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy. Thin as heck. The slightest contact creates dents. It was shipped with one corner completely shacked. The metal “grate” material (not the rack) is broken in several spots and I just took one right under the fingernail. Without dents, it is pretty though.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Denbow

customer_reviews.title: Great grill, just don’t let it get wet.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. But the paint won’t stand up against the heat of the fire. After 2 months the screen top has light rust where the flames heated it. I don’t know how normal that is, but the chrome grill, that I never used, already has specks of rust all over it.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Delivered super fast.
customer_reviews.text: Product is GREAT for the price , We will get MANY awesome fires out of it .
customer_reviews.author: KrystalA29

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful when burning wood
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful item. Easy to assemble Beautiful when burning wood and when not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my son-in-law and he seemed happy. I know he put it together Christmas night and enjoyed it with his family!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one. They 1st one lasted 2.5 years before it rusted out. We did cover it, but it was kept outdoors. We got a lot of use out of it, but just didn't last as long as we expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Carter

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We used it for my daughter birthday in January, everyone loved standing around it and enjoying the heat... we even made s’mores.
customer_reviews.author: Juana

customer_reviews.title: We love how big it is
customer_reviews.text: We love how big it is...deep enough you can put the lid on and it doesn't touch the wood and the open air helps stoke the fire. I recommend putting sand at the bottom to help keep it in good shape longer. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received dented
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately fire pit came in dented on one side. I did not send it back because I ordered it for a family reunions for the kids to roast marshmallows. It works very good for that purpose. Would give it higher marks if it won't of come in dented. Box was not dented.
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: You can do better
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and the size of this fire pit. It is very light but that is due to the manufactures skimped out and used very thin steel (I think it is 20 gauge sheet metal.) I dropped it one star due to the rust that has developed on the fire pit already and its not where the paint is at. Another star for quality: The lid flexes and twists, seams not completely welded, and missing paint. I'll be really surprised if it lasts two years without intervention.
customer_reviews.author: D. Neeley

customer_reviews.title: Great fire pit for backyard use.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this fire pit. This is the second one I've owned. The first one lasted about three and a half years. But in his defense, it said outside through snow, rain with wet ashes in the bottom the entire time. I've decided to buy a cover this time and I am sure it will double its life. The fire pit is the perfect size allowing you to stack several decent sized pieces of firewood horizontally across the bottom and build up from there. The grate that comes with it allows you to toss on some hotdogs or hamburgers. It is good looking and well made. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Camp4Fun

customer_reviews.title: Great pit but it rusts quickly
customer_reviews.text: Great fire pit, perfect size for a good fire, some rust started showing up on the metal only a few weeks after having it, I bought some black rust oleum and repainted the entire thing, one of the legs was bent in the box
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great for family time
customer_reviews.text: Love this fire pit. Nice to sit around with friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: We got a cover that fits.
customer_reviews.text: The top is rusting a little after being left out in the rain. But it looks awesome and is other wise perfect. We bought a ottoman cover for it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam & Delia

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup. 4 parts
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup. 4 parts, 4 screws. Took me about 3min to get this up and running. It'll take longer to get a fire going. Nice deep fire pit. Used the grill already for cooking some chicken, worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fire hearth!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! The size is perfect for our backyard fires. A real solid piece!
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Dolloff

customer_reviews.title: Item visible from box!
customer_reviews.text: So far the only thing I’ve disliked is the fact that this item is VERY visible from the outside of the box! Everything I order form amazon is never visible, but I came home to this lovely box with full color pictures all over it, which my husband brought in our home tonight after it was delivered. So, long story short, his Christmas surprise is ruined! Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: We love ours.
customer_reviews.text: Make sure yoy clean it out the next day after burning and keep it covered when not in use. Once a year clean off the rust, prime it and paint it with a high temperature paint. We love ours.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great fire pit/grill combo!
customer_reviews.text: Great outdoor fire pit and the grill is amazing for all types of food!
customer_reviews.author: lesliezeck

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, well made
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this little fire pit. Easy to assemble, sturdy. Large enough to hold larger logs.
customer_reviews.author: Cyngularcyn

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Know if it Will Last
customer_reviews.text: Love the firepit and it was really easy to put together. However after only using it twice the paint is peeling off of the cover! Makes me worry that the pit isn’t going to hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Carina

customer_reviews.title: Best fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Great size. Only problem is finding enough wood to burn.
customer_reviews.author: Pgeanis

customer_reviews.title: came bent but its great
customer_reviews.text: Great firepit. Love it but when received and took it out the box the pit was dented and bent with paint chipped. Didn't want to bother with a return or the hassle of contacting someone, so I kept it. But overall its great.
customer_reviews.author: Wilneris Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Rust appeared immediately after first use.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. After 1st use there was visible rust inside the firepit and within a few weeks rust spots started appearing on exterior. I'm returning for a replacement and hoping next one will hold up better.
customer_reviews.author: barbiemom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Any Occasion
customer_reviews.text: I use this fire pit all the time. It doesn’t matter if it is my fiancé relaxing by a small fire and I or the entire family enjoying the company of everyone, it gets the job done to perfection. 10 for 10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dane J.

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice. Does easily rust
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice. Does easily rust, but I bought a cover and that helps. I arrived slightly dented on one side, but not enough to require sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Been There

customer_reviews.title: Great design. Works well so far
customer_reviews.text: Great design. Works well so far. I have it covered when not using it so can't speak to the weathering process much.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Trkulja

customer_reviews.title: Nice fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Worth the money. Sturdy and attractive. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Jason Kauffman

customer_reviews.title: Looks ain’t everything
customer_reviews.text: Disliked.. damaged at arrival, poker is cheap and fell apart at the handle and not heavy duty for long usage.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This fire pit is beautiful and very sturdy! I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Garlock

customer_reviews.title: Great! We put it away when not in use ...
customer_reviews.text: Great! We put it away when not in use so that it will not rust.
customer_reviews.author: E. C. Braxton

customer_reviews.title: No hardware
customer_reviews.text: Love the firepit but it did not come with any nuts or bolts to put it together. Very disappointed in that respect.
customer_reviews.author: Linda T

customer_reviews.title: Bottom rusted out
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this fire pit for about 7 months now or so, and I’ve absolutely loved it, except for the fact that the bottom rusted out and there’s a huge whole now.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Cuomo

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully Made
customer_reviews.text: This fire pit looks beautiful in my backyard! It is durable and makes for a peaceful evening.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Beresovoy

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for a wedding gift!
customer_reviews.text: My niece and her spouse love this fire pit! They had originally requested one from Home Depot on their registry but it was not available so she chose this one. This one was much better!
customer_reviews.author: Pjhrab

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, won’t last
customer_reviews.text: Looks great out of the box, began rusting and bowing after 3-4 uses. Cheaper options with comparable quality in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Rueger

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful presentation.
customer_reviews.text: This was a silent auction item for a charity event. It was a wonderful item when filled with wine & blankets & other goodies. I’d buy it again with no doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Dolly Greenholt

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: Sprayed it with a rust resistant! Very durable and cute! Good size too
customer_reviews.author: Betty Music

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My kids got me this for mother’s day and, I absolute love it the grilling grate is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: chris rogers

customer_reviews.title: Ho hum hearth
customer_reviews.text: There is no way to dump out the ashes. Although the description prior to puchasing did not say ashes could be easily dumped, it didn't dawn on me that it would be difficult, but it is.
customer_reviews.author: Starry

customer_reviews.title: Great design!
customer_reviews.text: This fire pit is perfect for fires at the lake. Have had many fires in it already & it's great! I love the square design & also bought the cover for it to protect my investment.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Dahmen

customer_reviews.title: Great Firepit
customer_reviews.text: Was everything we expected. Haven't used the product yet as it has been too warm.
customer_reviews.author: K. K. Pendergraft

customer_reviews.title: Instant rust
customer_reviews.text: This fire pit started to rust immediately. It hasn’t fallen apart yet though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell
customer_reviews.text: Like the product, lighter in weight than I thought. Delivered dented on base and main body.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Sorce

customer_reviews.title: Fun and functional
customer_reviews.text: Pit works great! Used it on July 4 and used it to cook brauts and hot dogs! Was a hit! Nice ambiance and attractive!
customer_reviews.author: Donell O Nordwick

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice material can't wait to burn and grill something
customer_reviews.author: Javier Urrutia

customer_reviews.title: Love the look of this fire pit but not happy ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this fire pit but not happy with the quality. After several uses it began to rust.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought in Dec 2017, assembled towards the end and only used twice and its rusted.
customer_reviews.author: David Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great heat source
customer_reviews.text: Great product and disperses heat well around the whole area
customer_reviews.author: Sean White

customer_reviews.title: and they love it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas figt for our Son and Daughter in Law..it arrived right on time, and they love it..
customer_reviews.author: Donna J. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this fire pit! Easy to assemble and arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for the family reunion. Roasting marshmallows or sitting by the fire.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Townsend

customer_reviews.title: The box looked "beat up". One corner by the ...
customer_reviews.text: The box looked "beat up". One corner by the leg is damaged; looks as if it was dropped as it's bent inward. Not sure what my recourse is?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant Hearth Martin Extra Deep Wood Burning Fire Pit, 26-Inch
customer_reviews.text: I love my Pleasant Hearth Martin Extra Deep Wood Burning Fire Pit, 26-Inch. It holds lots of wood and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Penne Beckett

customer_reviews.title: Love it ..
customer_reviews.text: Love ... love ....love... Beautiful and so easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: donna Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed it this Summer and looking forward to using it this Fall.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This was pleasantly bigger than I expected and was very easy for my daughter to assemble. I haven't started using it since it's still 110 out but looking forward to it. I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a inexpensive looks good firepit.
customer_reviews.author: YK

customer_reviews.title: great gift
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a wedding gift. The couple unpacked it and had a fire going in it immediately! They loved it and the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: So modern and stylish, big pit for a nice fire
customer_reviews.author: Jay Graves Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best
customer_reviews.text: We sit around the fire pit every night love it

customer_reviews.title: nice wide outdoor fireplace
customer_reviews.text: nice wide outdoor fireplace! needs a cover if left outside, it will rust at the edges without one. overall great product
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Fitts

customer_reviews.title: Oh my gosh so easy to put together 8 screws yep that's it
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh so easy to put together 8 screws yep that's it... And it looks soooo good... Love it

customer_reviews.title: but it looks great.
customer_reviews.text: I little flimsy on the materials, but it looks great.

customer_reviews.title: All Beat Up!
customer_reviews.text: The pit just arrived today and it is Very bent!

customer_reviews.title: Seems like it will hold up well but time will tell
customer_reviews.text: Seems like it will hold up well but time will tell. Corners could be a rounded more so cover does not rip
customer_reviews.author: Frank Campbell

customer_reviews.title: This fire pit is a very nice size but looks like it will fall apart after ...
customer_reviews.text: This fire pit is a very nice size but looks like it will fall apart after second use. It has rust markings on it after first use and it had no water contact at all.
customer_reviews.author: M. S.

product_meta.title: Pleasant Hearth Martin Extra Deep Wood Burning Fire Pit, 26-Inch
product_meta.description: Style:Fire PitThe Martin Wood Burning Fire Pit will make an impressive fire when you are entertaining on your backyard patio. This deep fire pit includes a fire bowl that features the CirculAir™ system which raises the fire wood and allows oxygen to circulate for a consistent fire. The mesh panels help reduce escaping sparks. This unit includes a poker to tend the fire wood, and a chrome plated cooking grid to BBQ. The rubbed bronze finish accents the decorative styling on the sides, adding to the view of the fire.
feature_bullets: Extra deep design provides plenty of space for a raging fire.
Mesh cover to reduce the number of escaping sparks
The built-in Circulair system provides more air flow for bigger flames and a more consistent fire.
